column3: News;Pailin: A 68 year old British Philip James Sebastian Mayhew collapsed and died in  Pailin City.------The victim went to a shop “999” and ordered 2 cans of beer and went to the bathroom. Other customers found him on the floor dead..------Skilled forensic experts suspect he may have had fainting illness (stroke?).------His body was sent to the provincial hospital.------Warning
